caption: A soul perseveres in prayer through spiritual dryness, offering the will when feelings fail.
image_prompt: A stylized illustration of a solitary figure kneeling in a vast, arid desert at dusk, hands clasped in prayer. A single, deep well sits before them, its bucket empty and dry. Above, the sky transitions from a deep indigo to a soft, hopeful gold on the horizon, suggesting divine presence. The figure's posture is one of weary but determined devotion, their face turned upward with eyes closed in faith. The style is reminiscent of Studio Ghibli's evocative and emotionally resonant concept art, with soft lines and a serene, melancholic atmosphere focusing on the act of pure will.
